name: Hero Island
description:
The new free Hero Island game will give you the opportunity to feel like a hero! Clear the islands floating in the air, passing numerous puzzle levels and upgrade your hero! The player's goal is clear all islands from enemies in the correct sequence, otherwise you will lose!

Features of the game:

- 40 exciting puzzle levels (we will increase their number soon!)

- Use the knowledge of school mathematics to win!

- Customization of the main character with shields and weapons that can be bought with earned coins!
